disambig-desc: Adds the tag __DISAMBIG__ to mark [[Special:DisambiguationPages|disambiguation pages]]
disambiguationpages-summary:
The following is a list of all disambiguation pages on {{SITENAME}}.
A page is treated as a disambiguation page if it contains the tag __DISAMBIG__ (or an equivalent alias).
disambiguationpagelinks-summary:
The following pages contain at least one link to a disambiguation page. They may need to link to a more appropriate page instead.
A page is treated as a disambiguation page if it contains the tag __DISAMBIG__ (or an equivalent alias).
tag-disambiguator-link-added-description: Edits that add links to disambiguation pages
disambiguator-notification-question: Would you like to make this link more specific?
disambiguator-notification-summary: You linked to "[[$1]]" which is not a content page but a list of [https://mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Extension:Disambiguator topics with similar names].
